protocol_name: Euplotes crassus transfection using FuGene HD Transfection Reagent as vehicle (provisional)

affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

compare_forks.protocol_name_html: Euplotes crassus transfection using FuGene HD Transfection Reagent as vehicle (provisional)

authors_list.name: RACHELE CESARONI
authors_list.affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

components.data: Collect 4 x 104 well-fed Euplotes crassus cells (we used E.coli as the only food source) by centrifugation at 400 rcf for 3 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Collect 4 x 104 well-fed Euplotes crassus cells (we used E.coli as the only food source) by centrifugation at 400 rcf for 3 minutes.

components.data: Wash the cells twice with artificial sea water (see attachment for the recipe) and once with 500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.0 (400 rcf for 3 minutes each time). Then resuspend Euplotes crassus cells in 50 μl of the medium (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.0). To get this small volume you may require an additional minute of centrifugation.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the cells twice with artificial sea water (see attachment for the recipe) and once with 500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.0 (400 rcf for 3 minutes each time). Then resuspend Euplotes crassus cells in 50 μl of the medium (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.0). To get this small volume you may require an additional minute of centrifugation.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Euplotes crassus transfection using FuGene HD Transfection Reagent as vehicle (provisional)
source_data.protocol_name: Euplotes crassus transfection using FuGene HD Transfection Reagent as vehicle (provisional)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Euplotes crassus transfection using FuGene HD Transfection Reagent as vehicle (provisional)
source_data.annotation:
Recipe for complete sea water (1 L):

36 g Reef Crystals
1 ml Walne's solution
1 ml of 10 μg/ml FeSO4

0.2 ml of 2 mg/ml thiamine (light sensitive; store at 4 ºC)
Add distilled water up to 1 L
source_data.thread_text:
Recipe for complete sea water (1 L):

36 g Reef Crystals
1 ml Walne's solution
1 ml of 10 μg/ml FeSO4

0.2 ml of 2 mg/ml thiamine (light sensitive; store at 4 ºC)
Add distilled water up to 1 L
source_data.body:
Recipe for complete sea water (1 L):

36 g Reef Crystals
1 ml Walne's solution
1 ml of 10 μg/ml FeSO4

0.2 ml of 2 mg/ml thiamine (light sensitive; store at 4 ºC)
Add distilled water up to 1 L
source_data.affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

components.data: Transfer the cells into wells within a 96-well plate for transfection.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the cells into wells within a 96-well plate for transfection.

components.data: Allow FuGene HD Transfection Reagent to reach room temperature, and then mix it by inverting or vortexing briefly (if you see a precipitate, briefly warm it at 37°C, and then let it reach room temperature).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Allow FuGene HD Transfection Reagent to reach room temperature, and then mix it by inverting or vortexing briefly (if you see a precipitate, briefly warm it at 37°C, and then let it reach room temperature).

components.data: Add 90-98 μl of medium (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.0) at room temperature and 4 μg of DNA in MilliQ H2O (0.2-1 μg/μL) to an Eppendorf tube and vortex (after adding the DNA the final volume must be 100 μl).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 90-98 μl of medium (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.0) at room temperature and 4 μg of DNA in MilliQ H2O (0.2-1 μg/μL) to an Eppendorf tube and vortex (after adding the DNA the final volume must be 100 μl).

components.data: Add 6 μl of FuGene HD Transfection Reagent directly to the medium and mix immediately.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 6 μl of FuGene HD Transfection Reagent directly to the medium and mix immediately.

components.data: Icubate FuGene HD Transfection Reagent and DNA mixture for 15 minutes at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Icubate FuGene HD Transfection Reagent and DNA mixture for 15 minutes at room temperature.

components.data: Add 10 μl of the FuGene HD Transfection Reagent and DNA mixture to the 50 μl of Euplotes crassus cells in medium (mix everything by pipetting).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 10 μl of the FuGene HD Transfection Reagent and DNA mixture to the 50 μl of Euplotes crassus cells in medium (mix everything by pipetting).

components.data: One hour after addition of FuGene/DNA complexes, add 50 μl of artificial sea water to the cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: One hour after addition of FuGene/DNA complexes, add 50 μl of artificial sea water to the cells.

components.data: After another hour, add to the cells other 50 μl of artificial sea water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After another hour, add to the cells other 50 μl of artificial sea water.

components.data: An hour later harvest the cells (400 rcf for 3 minutes), and wash them twice with artificial sea water (400 rcf for 3 min each time). Then resuspend them in 400 μl of the artificial sea water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: An hour later harvest the cells (400 rcf for 3 minutes), and wash them twice with artificial sea water (400 rcf for 3 min each time). Then resuspend them in 400 μl of the artificial sea water.

components.data: Transfer the cells into glass depression wells for subsequent monitoring.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the cells into glass depression wells for subsequent monitoring.

components.data: Incubate the cells at 24°C, then examine them by fluorescence microscopy to determine expression of the construct.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the cells at 24°C, then examine them by fluorescence microscopy to determine expression of the construct.
